sourceMeaningMnemonic: Your <radical>buddy</radical> the <radical>sheep</radical> is part of a <kanji>flock</kanji>. A flock of sheep. Your sheep buddy is a member of a flock.
meaningInfo: Imagine following your sheep buddy back to his flock. Feel the soft fur of all the sheep around you as they baa peacefully.
readingMnemonic: Now take out your <reading>gun</reading> (<ja>ぐん</ja>) and murder every sheep in the <kanji>flock</kanji>. Except for your buddy. You’re incredibly jealous of your buddy and you don’t like the attention his flock gives him so that’s why you decided to murder them all with a gun.
readingInfo: Feel the recoil of the gun in your hands and the ringing of the shots in your ears as you slaughter the flock without remorse. BANG BANG BANG!
